# The Manual

## Writing Super Collider Synthesisers For Sonic Pi

This manual is based on **Sonic Pi 5 (Technical Preview)**.

#### Author - Gordon Guthrie

```
 
           _       _                 
     /\   | |     | |                
    /  \  | |_ __ | |__   __ _
```

This manual is now ready for review - please read the ***For Reviewers*** section.
